title: OTA rules, Betting on the NFL, Gronk/Rodgers' Deals (Football 06/08)
description:
CBS NFL Insider Jason La Canfora joins Dave Richard to discuss the Ravens being fined for violating league rules during OTAs and to break down the latest with Rob Gronkowski and Aaron Rodgers' contract situations. The guys also discuss the impact of gambling on the NFL, rookie QB over/unders, and the Browns having to earn their helmet stripes.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
